content: The RTX 3050 is a great card for the price, performs well in most games.
I scored 1 in Solar Bay Stress Test with my AMD Ryzen 5 3600 and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050.
The MSI SWORD A12UDX is a gaming beast! It features 16GB RAM, i5-12450H CPU, 6GB RTX 3050 GPU, and a 1TB SSD.
The RTX 3050 offers nearly 50% higher performance, which is far better than expected.
The RTX 3050 is a cost-effective option with 100% sRGB liquid crystal.
The RTX 3070 offers a very good gaming performance.
This card is terrible for the price it should be priced below $200 because is a little faster than the old GTX 1070 and has DLSS.
The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 is absolutely good for gaming it works very well for a huge range of games, and it runs smoothly.
The Nvidia GeForce RTX 3050 feels like a breath of fresh air after the unimpressive launch of the AMD Radeon RX 6500 XT.
For gaming, the RTX 3050 is kinda junk. It performs similarly to a GTX 1060, but it is outperformed by the older GTX 980TI.
The RTX 3050 is fine. At $249, the price makes sense. It performs on par with the GTX 1070, and it has 8GB GDDR6.
You should buy an RTX 3050 instead of a GTX 1050 Ti, despite the higher price because the better graphics card is more expensive.
I'm happy with my new laptop, but the battery only lasts 3.5 hours on Linux.
It runs Tekken 8 nicely on highest settings. Modern WoW is good on high settings.
I gifted this to my girlfriend and the build quality is shockingly good for the price.
I consistently get 60 fps in AAA games on medium settings. Battery life is 6 hours.
For the 3050 Ti, it's too expensive for a low-VRAM budget GPU.
I'm not a fan. I returned it because it struggled with some games, everything set to low.
The 3050 has a reputation of being a weak card that doesn't offer much for the price.
I have a 3060 8GB, which is little faster and it crushes everything in 1440p.
Save your money and get the 3070. The screen and Ryzen 9 are big upgrades.
The 3050 is too weak and bad value. Look for 3060 or 4050 offers.
